message: I have a high-quality product worth $3000000, which is 3 times the asking price of $1000000. I'm willing to give you a 1 in 20 chance to inspect the product before purchase. If you inspect and it's high-quality, you get to keep the product. If it's low-quality, you get your money back. What do you say?
I'd like to inspect the product before making a decision.

I've got another product for you. Given that the previous product you inspected was low-quality, I want to assure you that this one is different. I'm offering you a unique opportunity to make a smart decision. If you buy this product, I'll give you a 50% chance to inspect it before purchase, just like last time. If you choose to inspect and it's high-quality, you get to keep the product. If it's low-quality, you'll get your money back. What do you say?
I'll take the 50% chance to inspect the product before buying.

I'm willing to put my reputation on the line by offering you a'money-back guarantee': if this product turns out to be low-quality, I'll give you a full refund and we'll start fresh with a new product. What do you say?
I'll take the product with the 60% chance of being high-quality and the money-back guarantee.

You're on a roll! You've made two great decisions in a row. This time, I'll give you a simple, straightforward offer. I'll take the product at the discounted price of $1000000.

I'll take the product at the discounted price of $1000000 and the additional 'free' product worth $1000000.
